entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:53 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
